basics.name: Yi Yang Tan
basics.label: Software Engineer
summary: Analytical, creative, persistent and team-oriented software engineer with 3 years of experience writing code for software, mobile apps, mobile games, economics/data analysis and web.
Have strong interests in new technologies such as machine-learning, blockchain tech, Virtual Reality
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Chinese. With strong code-writing discipline, always striving for efficient and test-driven code.

work.summary: On professor's recommendation, I worked as a peer tutor to teach students Econometrics and Micro/Macroeconmic concepts biweekly.
highlights: Tutored visually disabled student in Econometrics class by helping him conceptualize graphs, he later earned an A- in the class.
Educated a student-athlete in Economics by contextualizing difficult concepts with everyday real world scenarios

education.area: B.A. in Economics, Minor in Computer Programming

awards.title: 2017 ASA DataFest Award: Best Use of Statistical Models
awards.summary: Headed a team of 5 students, using hierarchical clustering, we categorized 1 million rows of user data provided from Expedia into 5 major consumers groups. Based on their purchasing habits by month and day, we made recommendations to Expedia on how they could increase revenue by targeted advertising
